name: varint

varint.abstract: A signed and unsigned 64 bit integer encoding scheme that saves disk space

abstract: A signed and unsigned 64 bit integer encoding scheme that saves disk space
description: Provides two data types VARINT64 and VARUINT64 that can be used to store integers in a space efficient manner. Instead of consuming 8 bytes per integer, VARINT64 and VARUINT64 will store the same number in as few as 2 bytes.
